definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 8:a. [[אגא]]: authority for Ar. vb. 0’aja0’a flee is slender, but word occurs as n.pr. mont., and elsewhere (GFM, privately).

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: — [[אגס]]: Ar. 0’ajima also = spoil (of water); cf. 0’ajamah;un (0’ajamun) = pool, reed-bed (also tangled thicket, etc.) Lane, and marsh Dozy:i. 11.
